page.title: 04Wood Lane
page.content: Wood Lane is on the far side of Apedale from Chesterton. It is a small, friendly village although a large housing estate has increased the population recently. There is plenty of entertainment such as a Youth Club with disco dancing for children, the Liberty Workingmen's Club and Institute, a Sunday School, a park and a chapel. Vandalism is not very common in Wood Lane. It is an agricultural area with many farms dotted around. There are no other industries beside farming. There isn't a supermarket but they do have a Post Office and general store and a butcher's.
